name: HHAdvisor
description: Welcome in the world of Hell and Heaven Management. You are gods new advisor and are supposed to choose the place where souls go to live their eternal life. Be careful what you do, because the demons and angels require their souls, that's is why you should try to keep their numbers fairly even. Every soul comes with a tag attached that provides you with his story. Try to achieve a score of 100 by choosing the best place for the souls.
